Lists

order list:

  1. Foo
  2. Bar

unorder list:

  • A list item.

    With multiple paragraphs.

  • Bar

nested list:

  • Abacus
    • answer
  • Bubbles
    1. bunk
    2. bupkis
      • BELITTLER
    3. burper
  • Cunning

Blockquotes

Email-style angle brackets are used for blockquotes.

And, they can be nested.

Headers in blockquotes

  • You can quote a list.
  • Etc.

Inline Code

<code> spans are delimited by backticks.

You can include literal backticks like `this`.

Block Code

This is a normal paragraph.

This is a preformatted
code block.

Horizontal Rules

Fenced code blocks are like Stardard Markdown’s regular code blocks, except that they’re not indented and instead rely on a start and end fence lines to delimit the code block.
